modName: Blade Of Woe (No Charging and Better Stats)
summary: Blade Of Woe (No Charging and Better Stats)
descriptionHtml:
I really don't like to recharge really good weapons. I made the Blade Of Woe non rechargeable....
Now the blade will stay charged. Is it overpowered, no! It just
cuts out the BS with recharging the thing over and over again...

In this update I made the blade of woe as good as the dragonbone dagger and boosted the absorb health by 25 points... I always felt like the blade of woe was a little underpowered to be a quest weapon. Now you will be able to play the game on master a little bit easier ...
author: Bob100
